DataElement.preferredDefinition: The code that represents the histologic category of a tumor using the World Health Organization Classification of Tumors.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tumor Identifier Domain WHO Classification of Tumors
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A domain that represents the data that uniquely identifies tumors._A classification of benign and malignant tumors by World Health Organization (WHO) experts based primarily on histologic findings.
